participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and empathetic, yet struggles with self-esteem.
participant_1.background: i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working. i work at a nursing home. i do not believe in god. i'm overweight and unhappy.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and friendly, but easily overwhelmed by his feelings.
participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

content.text:
I am little bit shy‚ò∫Ô∏è 
Tell me about yourself!
So what's up with your family?
I have a lot of problems. I am not good at it. Are you overweight and unhappy?
Wow. What problems exactly do you have? I am fine by the way. Never been happier
I am not sure. I am not looking for a job, but i am not good at it.
Why are you not looking for a job? Jobs are important
I am not sure. I am looking for a job at the local hospital.
So you are into medical stuff, huh. I am not to tell you the truth
I am not sure of that. I am only in the shower.
